text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (-All Hooves Day)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Fan appreciation festivals are held twice a year. While the spring festival is more athletic focused, the autumn festival has a much nicer name attached to it.)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Different classes, teams, and volunteer groups gather to exhibit their works. So you could say it is Tracen's "Cultural Festival"…)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (It's an Ultra Rare Godly event where Uma Musume get to show off their skills outside of races!! That's basically it!!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Now then, my name is Agnes Digital. Your average everyday Uma Musume.)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Normally, I take in my surroundings through an unseen filter. However!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Please go to our Haunted House!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Why… why am I wearing such flashy clothes while acting equally as flashy? To answer, we have to go back to a month ago…)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Back when summer break had just ended, and the cicadas were singing to signal the middle of summer.)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (And when the Demon Queen Army still only had one member…)

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Hehe… heheheheheh……HE HE HE HE… !!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Wahahaha! My super ultra spooky scary haunted house plan is done! I call it "Demon Queen Windy-chan's Castle Project"! It's perfect!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Anyone who comes visit this will be so scared their feet will knock off!!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Don't you mean you'll knock them off their feet? Good morning, Windy-chan!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Good morning! Since you spoke up, I see… you want to join Demon Queen Windy's Army, is that right?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Well, since you asked, I'll let you join! For you see, the Demon Queen Castle Project is already at peak majesty!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Hahaha, I see, I see. You've been working hard on a new prank plan, right? Just don't go too far with that, okay?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Eh? No, this isn't a prank…

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate B
text_block_list.text: Hey, let me borrow your Sports Nutrition textbook! I totally forgot we had a quiz today!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Fine fine. What am I gonna do with you… Well then, see you later, Windy!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Hmph! It's not a prank plan, darn it.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: And here I thought we could all work together as the Demon Queen Army, and make a big buzz during the All Hooves' Day festival…

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Well who cares! Windy already has a doctorate for devilish deeds! I can do this myself! As long as I have this super perfect project booklet with me―

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: As long as I have… it… with… !?!?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: It's gone! Gone gone gone!? The project booklet!? Did I drop it somewhere～～!?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: It's not here either… gone, gone, gone, it's gone…

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: I've stayed up so many nights working on that…
(Crash!!)

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Whaa!? What's happening!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Doto-san, are you okay!?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Owowowow… Uuu, I'm fine… Good thing we didn't step on this booklet.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: You would sacrifice your own body for someone's lost item!? Such a caring heart you have! You're a saint — no, an angel!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… I just ended up falling to avoid it. I'm just clumsy, really…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I pray to the world. May your beauty be eternal. Please bless this positively pure and precious being with a good and happy life.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Going back… I wonder who dropped this thing, anyway? Uhm… "Demon Queen Castle Blueprint"…?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Ah! My booklet!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: (I have to take it back now! They're probably gonna think it's just plans for making pranks, and think that I'm…)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ho, hohohoho…! "Demon Queen Windy-chan's Castle Project"…!? I can feel such majesty overflowing from this notebook! Each page turn just echoes with nobility!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: …Huh?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Wow, she even obsessed over the fine details of the setting. This is amazing…!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Hmhmhm mmm!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: A haunted house that uses a castle theme, I see! How I wish I could see, hear, and feel everything about this from beginning to end!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: It feels so ambitious, but I think it would be fun to try and pull it off…

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: …Hey, you two over there! If that's what you're thinking, then I have no choice!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: I'll make an exception and promote you two to generals of the Demon Queen Army!! So let's… let's…

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Let's make the "Demon Queen Windy-chan Castle Project" a success!!
